frontmatter.title: How to Play Badminton Doubles with a Weaker Partner [Strategies and Tactics]
frontmatter.description: We’ve all had it, the frustration that comes from losing a match when you were paired with a weaker player. It’s hard to get over and most of the time you’re not sure what you could have done differently. In this guide, I’m going to talk you through strategies and tactics to help you win even when playing with a weaker player. So, how do you play Badminton doubles with a weaker partner?
